metadata.author: Seanje & Nova Dawn on behalf of CreativeWorkzStudio LLC
metadata.description: OmniJSON serves as the dynamic dataset that structures OmniCode's machine and assembly language, ensuring all instructions, execution rules, and validation processes remain aligned with structured intelligence.

version_history.changes: Initial JSON creation and data population.

biblical_anchor.overall_reference: Genesis 1:3 – 'And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.'

instructions.execution: Isaiah 55:11 – 'So shall My word be that goes forth from My mouth; it shall not return to Me void, but it shall accomplish what I please.'
instructions.arithmetic: Proverbs 16:11 – 'Honest scales and balances belong to the Lord; all the weights in the bag are of His making.'
instructions.control_flow: Ecclesiastes 3:1 – 'To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven.'
instructions.memory: John 14:26 – 'But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in My name, He will teach you all things and bring to your remembrance all that I have said to you.'
instructions.communication: Proverbs 18:21 – 'Death and life are in the power of the tongue, and those who love it will eat its fruit.'

body.description: Defines the structural framework for dynamically injected instructions.

instructions.execution: Isaiah 55:11 – 'So shall My word be that goes forth from My mouth; it shall not return to Me void, but it shall accomplish what I please.'
instructions.arithmetic: Proverbs 16:11 – 'Honest scales and balances belong to the Lord; all the weights in the bag are of His making.'
instructions.control_flow: Ecclesiastes 3:1 – 'To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven.'
instructions.memory: John 14:26 – 'But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in My name, He will teach you all things and bring to your remembrance all that I have said to you.'
instructions.communication: Proverbs 18:21 – 'Death and life are in the power of the tongue, and those who love it will eat its fruit.'

execution.name: GENESIS
execution.execution_basics: Marks the entry point of execution, setting up the initial execution state.

execution.name: EXODUS
execution.execution_basics: Finalizes execution, ensuring proper shutdown of processes.
execution.biblical_reference: Exodus 14:21 – 'Then Moses stretched out his hand.'

execution.name: WITNESS
execution.execution_basics: Stores execution logs for validation and traceability.
execution.biblical_reference: Luke 8:17 – 'Nothing is hidden that will not be revealed.'

execution.name: TESTIFY
execution.execution_basics: Verifies execution integrity by comparing expected and actual execution states.
execution.biblical_reference: John 15:26 – 'The Spirit of truth who testifies.'

execution.name: ALTAR
execution.execution_basics: Moves data into a temporary register or memory location.

execution.name: SCROLL
execution.execution_basics: Processes OmniCode Logos files into structured execution-ready Scroll files.
execution.biblical_reference: Ezekiel 2:9-10 – 'A scroll written on both sides.'

execution.name: MANNA
execution.execution_basics: Executes processed scroll files, transitioning into manna-level structured intelligence.

arithmetic.name: BE FRUITFUL
arithmetic.execution_basics: Adds two values together and stores the result in the destination register.

arithmetic.name: WITHHOLD
arithmetic.execution_basics: Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the result in the destination register.
arithmetic.biblical_reference: Judges 7:3 – 'Anyone who trembles with fear may turn back.'

arithmetic.name: INCREASE
arithmetic.execution_basics: Multiplies two values together and stores the result in the destination register.

arithmetic.name: DIVIDE
arithmetic.execution_basics: Divides the first value by the second and stores the result in the destination register.
arithmetic.biblical_reference: Matthew 12:25 – 'A house divided against itself cannot stand.'

arithmetic.name: PORTION
arithmetic.execution_basics: Performs modulus operation, storing the remainder after division.
arithmetic.biblical_reference: Exodus 16:18 – 'Whoever gathered much had nothing left over, and whoever gathered little had no lack.'

control_flow.name: WALK
control_flow.description: Loops through a block of code.
control_flow.execution_basics: Unconditionally jumps to another section of the program, allowing loops and repeated execution.
control_flow.biblical_reference: Isaiah 30:21 – 'This is the way; walk in it.'

control_flow.name: IF FAITHFUL
control_flow.execution_basics: Executes the next block of code only if the condition evaluates to true.
control_flow.biblical_reference: Joshua 24:15 – 'Choose for yourselves this day whom you will serve.'

control_flow.name: IF UNFAITHFUL
control_flow.execution_basics: Executes the next block of code only if the condition evaluates to false.
control_flow.biblical_reference: Matthew 7:23 – 'I never knew you. Depart from me, you evildoers.'

control_flow.name: CALL
control_flow.execution_basics: Saves the current execution state and jumps to a function, allowing structured subroutines.
control_flow.biblical_reference: Jeremiah 33:3 – 'Call to me and I will answer you.'

control_flow.name: RETURN
control_flow.description: Exits a function and returns control.
control_flow.execution_basics: Restores the previous execution state and continues execution where it left off.
control_flow.biblical_reference: Luke 15:20 – 'So he got up and returned to his father.'

memory.name: TABERNACLE
memory.execution_basics: Pushes the current execution state onto the stack for later retrieval.

memory.name: DWELL
memory.execution_basics: Pops the last saved execution state from the stack and restores it.
memory.biblical_reference: Psalm 91:1 – 'Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High.'

memory.name: REMEMBER
memory.execution_basics: Loads a stored value from memory into a register for use.
memory.biblical_reference: Luke 22:19 – 'Do this in remembrance of me.'

memory.name: ALTAR
memory.execution_basics: Moves data from a register into a designated memory location.

communication.name: DECLARE
communication.execution_basics: Takes a message and moves it into a designated output register or stream.
communication.biblical_reference: Psalm 33:9 – 'For He spoke, and it came to be.'

communication.name: SEND
communication.execution_basics: Calls a function or subroutine within the structured execution model.

communication.name: GRAFT
communication.execution_basics: Opens a structured communication channel for external interactions.
communication.biblical_reference: Romans 11:17 – 'You, though a wild olive shoot, have been grafted in.'

instruction_handling.execution_process: Instructions are validated against OmniSchema, then executed according to structured intelligence rules.

closing.description: Finalizes schema validation, prepares execution for next cycle, and ensures structured integrity.

update_history.changes: Finalized OmniJSON with structured execution instruction sets.
